Original: 新開幕，備餐速度稍慢，應該會慢慢改善。麵和燉飯都好吃，份量也不錯，會再來。
EN: The new opening, the speed of meals is slightly slower, and it should be improved slowly.Noodles and stewed rice are delicious, and the portion is good, and they will come again.

Original: 店員服務非常親切到位，濃湯也好好喝，炸雞是超好吃的，義大利麵就只能用堪稱完美來形容了，太棒了，又多了一間口袋名單
EN: The clerk service is very kind in place, and the soup is also good. Fried chicken is super delicious. The pasta can only be described as perfect.

Original: 東西好吃  老闆娘很漂亮!!!!!
EN: What is delicious, the boss is very beautiful !!!!!

Original:
初訪，11/7新開幕的店家，開幕期間88折到本月底。建議先訂位。
西式餐點口味都不錯，份量大，現打綜合果汁好喝。
環境乾淨明亮，洗手間空間大且維護乾淨。
親子友善，服務和善。掃碼點餐，本週還不能刷卡，出餐流程上還沒有很熟練順暢。
牛肉麵目前先暫停供應。
相信之後各方面都會更流暢。加油！
會再訪。
EN:
In the first visit, the newly opened store at 11/7 was 88 % off at the end of this month.It is recommended to book a seat first.
Western -style meals are good, and the amount is large, and it is delicious.
The environment is clean and bright, the bathroom space is large and the maintenance is clean.
Parent -child friendship, service and goodness.Sweep the code and order, this week cannot be swiped, and the meal process is not very skilled and smooth.
Beef noodles are currently suspended.
I believe that all aspects will be smoother afterwards.come on!
Will visit again.

Original:
試營運首日趕緊來嚐鮮，青醬義大利麵味道不錯，蛤蜊數量多且新鮮，份量也很足夠。
我們到的時候紅燒牛肉麵已經賣完了，所以改點了牛肉乾拌麵。醬汁味道濃郁，稍微有點辣，不過牛肉的口感稍微有點硬。
希望未來能提供筆管麵或其他種類的麵條，讓顧客可以加價選擇。🫶🏻
EN:
On the first day of the trial operation, I quickly came to try something new. The green sauce has a good taste. The number of clams is large and fresh, and the portion is sufficient.
When we arrived, the braised beef noodles had been sold, so we changed the beef jerky noodles.The sauce is strong and a little spicy, but the taste of beef is slightly hard.
It is hoped that in the future, we can provide pen tube or other types of noodles so that customers can choose to increase the price.Bleak
